name: Comfort (satchmo1991)
description:
Comfort is a game about a child finding their way in the dark. It was made in early February of 2021 as part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 where the theme was "Stronger Together".

You navigate the dark levels with a candle revealing scary shapes as being nothing more than furniture (coat racks), and collecting teddy bears as you go to increase your comfort level and field of view. 

A lot of the ideas that I had didn't make it into the game because of time (it was my first game jam), but I am pretty happy with what I managed over the course of the week.

All assets in the game were made entirely by me with the help and support of my loving wife, Victoria. I plan to release a devlog of the process on YouTube. Search for SatchmoPlays and/or Comfort Devlog. 

Comments and feedback are highly encouraged! Thanks for playing!
